channel.title: Authors on Philip's Curve
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Philip's Curve

item.description: Philip is an Economics graduate with some experience in applied microeconomics research and machine learning. Formerly a data science instructor at The Center of Applied Data Science, he believes in the power of new data sources to derive critical insights to inform the direction of public policy. He is interested in topics in labour, health and development economics, and keeps a keen eye on developments in ethical applications of artificial intelligence.
